result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger B. Holzem

records.addlTxt:
Pre-trial conference on December 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on January 12, 2023 at 03:30 pm.

Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Defendant shall not possess or use any dangerous weapons during the pendency of this action. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 2:34 pm.
Clerk: Nicole.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence.  Defendant appears in custody from MCJ, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Julie Sawyer.

Date and time set for initial appearance; VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY.

BOND:  $500.00 signature bond.

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession or use of dangerous weapons. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
PT: 12/7/22 @ 11:00 am.
JPT/TPD: 1/12/23 @ 3:30 pm.

Adjourned: 2:36 pm.
